meanings.definition: The number that is one more than fourteen and one less than sixteen.
meanings.sent1: I counted up to fifteen candies in the jar.
meanings.sent2: She turned fifteen years old last week.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over fifteen books off the shelf!
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like fifteen suns.
meanings.sent5: The clock struck fifteen times, signaling midnight.

meanings.definition: A group or set of fifteen people or things.
meanings.sent1: There were exactly fifteen students in the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The team consisted of fifteen players.
meanings.sent3: Fifteen ducks waddled in a row, following their leader.
meanings.sent4: The garden bloomed with fifteen different flowers.
meanings.sent5: The choir sang with the harmony of fifteen voices.
